metadata.title: CVE-2018-20676 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
In Bootstrap before 3.4.0, XSS is possible in the tooltip data-viewportattribute.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20676` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-glyphicons-halflings - 1.009~3.4.1+dfsg-3
libjs-bootstrap - 3.4.1+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.0+dfsg-1').
twitter-bootstrap3 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.0+dfsg-1').
twitter-bootstrap4 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
